title: Zapatista Army of National Liberation
summary: The Zapatista Army of National Liberation (Ejército Zapatista de Liberación Nacional, EZLN), often referred to as the Zapatistas (Mexican Spanish pronunciation: [sapaˈtistas]), is a libertarian socialist political and militant group[3][4][5][6] that controls a substantial amount of territory in Chiapas, the southernmost state of Mexico.
